content.rendered:
AqualisBraemar is involved in supporting the development of offshore renewable energy by providing engineering consultancy for the following areas:

  • Planning and QA/QC of Geotechnical and Geophysical Site Investigation and Laboratory Testing
  • Site Assessment including Cable Route
  • Foundation System Assessment (Gravity Based, Monopile, Tripod, Jacket)
  • Mooring System Design and Analysis for Floating Structure
  • Offshore Lifting Analysis
  • Cable Installation Analysis
  • Mooring Analysis / DP Capability Analysis of Installation vessel
  • Foundation Assessment of Jack-up for Installation
  • Load-Out Engineering
  • Transportation Engineering

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine & Offshore Engineering Services
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We provide marine & offshore engineering services in the major marine energy centers around the world. Our engineers have a good understanding of the local regulatory requirements, the available industry infrastructure and the culture they operate in.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine Risk Management
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar has extensive experience in risk identification and marine risk management in concept development, detailed design, engineering, temporary phases and operations of both oil & gas offshore assets and the renewable energy sector.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Geotechnical Engineering
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our geotechnical staff are specialists in jack up leg penetration analyses, offshore site investigations, and geotechnical design and installation analysis for offshore oil & gas and wind turbine foundations.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Offshore Transportation & Installation Services
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our T&I department consists of project managers, naval architects, structural engineers, field engineers and master mariners. The team has many years of experience within the offshore industry, and in locations such as China, S.E. Asia, Middle East and Nigeria.

jetpack-related-posts.title: MOU/MODU Installation Engineering
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our Engineering team has extensive experience in installation of Mobile Offshore Unit (MOU) and Mobile Offshore Drilling Unit (MODU) ranging from site appraisal, transportation (location move), foundation assessment for jack-ups, mooring analysis for floaters to structural assessment of MOU/MODU.
